benchmark_details.name: CPG-EVAL (Chinese Pedagogical Grammar Evaluation)
benchmark_details.overview: CPG-EVAL is the first dedicated benchmark specifically designed to evaluate LLMsâ€™ knowledge of pedagogical grammar within the context of foreign language instruction. It comprises five tasks designed to assess grammar recognition, fine-grained grammatical distinction, categorical discrimination, and resistance to linguistic interference.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To systematically evaluate LLMs' pedagogical grammar competence in teaching Chinese as a second language.

data.source: Constructed from the Chinese Grammar Learning Manual (CGLM) and synthetic data generated based on expert guidelines.
data.annotation: Synthetic data reviewed and revised by expert linguists.

methodology.calculation: Scores calculated by comparing model outputs against the correct answers using regular expressions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better understanding and application of pedagogical grammar by LLMs.
methodology.validation: Benchmarked against multiple open-source and proprietary LLMs under a zero-shot setting.
